function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differences between genders in perception of telecommuting","Impact":"Gender bias and inequality in telecommuting opportunities and experiences","Mitigation":"Implement gender-neutral telecommuting policies and provide equal support and resources for all employees","Technologies":"Telecommuting platforms and tools that enable seamless remote work for all employees","People":"Employees, especially female employees","Owner":"Human resources department and organizational leadership"},{"Description":"Impact of telecommuting on the economy","Impact":"Potential negative impact on the economy if telecommuting is not managed effectively","Mitigation":"Implement policies and incentives to balance the economic impact of telecommuting, such as supporting local businesses and infrastructure","Technologies":"Economic modeling and forecasting tools to assess the economic impact of telecommuting","People":"Government, business owners, and policymakers","Owner":"Government and economic planning organizations"},{"Description":"Effect of telecommuting on sleep patterns","Impact":"Disruption of sleep patterns due to remote work and increased screen time","Mitigation":"Promote healthy work-life balance and provide resources for managing sleep patterns, such as wellness programs and education on sleep hygiene","Technologies":"Sleep tracking apps and wearable devices for monitoring and improving sleep quality","People":"Remote workers and employees","Owner":"Employers and occupational health professionals"}]}
